frontmatter.title: Space Art
frontmatter.description: My first contact with digital art, the birth of my aesthetic self. Making space wallpapers got me started with digital design tools and with a vibrant community of online artists and designers called DeviantArt.
frontmatter.minibio: My first contact with digital design, at 14yo, creating space art wallpapers.

frontmatter.title: infHub
frontmatter.description: A platform for university students to share their projects.
frontmatter.minibio: My first web development and UX project. A platform for university students to share their projects.
